text:
This warning didn't appear with Ant 1.4.1, and makes sense only if 
the 'compiler' attribute of <javac> is explicitly specified. This clutters the 
output of my build, and confuses my users. I believe Ant should be as build-
user-friendly as possible, in addition to being build-writer-friendly.

This is a regression. --DD
creator: ddevienne@lgc.com

text:
Created attachment 3333
Javac.java patch, hopefully to make it into 1.5.1
creator: ddevienne@lgc.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
This patch would suppress the warning if the user set the magic build.compiler
property as well, which is wrong IMHO.

I've committed a different patch (too late for 1.5.1, obviously).

Yes, I realized that after I posted it, but did know a good way to take 
build.compiler into account. Your patch is much better, thank you Stefan. --DD
creator: ddevienne@lgc.com
